abilities.name: Guild Ships
abilities.description: You may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbors.

abilities.name: Arbiters
abilities.description: When you are negotiating a transaction, action cards can be exchanged as part of a transacation.

abilities.name: Masters of Trade
abilities.description: You do not have to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the 'Trade' strategy card

faction_techs.name: Quantum Datahub Node (YYY)
faction_techs.description: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool and give another player 3 of your trade goods. If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of their strategy cards.

faction_techs.name: Production Biomes (GG)
faction_techs.description: ACTON: Exhaust this card and spend 1 strategy token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

agents.name: Carth of Golden Sands
agents.description: During the action phase: You may exhaust tis card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.

commanders.name: Gila the Silvertongue
commanders.description: Unlock: Have 10 Trade Goods. When you cast votes: You may spend any number of trade goods; cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

heroes.name: Harrugh Gafhara
heroes.description: GALACTIC SECURITIES NET When one or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may reduce the cost of each of your units to 0 during this use of PRODUCTION. If you do, purge this card.

promissory.name: Trade Convoys
promissory.description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor. If you activate a systemthat contains one or more of the Hacan player's units, return this card ot the Hacan player.

flagship.name: Wrath of Kenara
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 7 (x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. Sustain Damage. After you roll a die during a space combat in this system, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

mech.name: Pride of Kenara
mech.description: Cost 2, Combat 6. Sustain Damage. This planet's card may be traded as part of a transaction; if you do, move all of your units from this planet to another planet you control.

starting_fleet.name: Merchant Fleet
starting_fleet.description: 2 Carriers, 1 Cruiser, 2 Fighters, 4 Infantry, 1 Space Dock

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.description: When you gain command tokens during the status phase, gain 1 additional command token.

abilities.name: Orbital Drop
abilities.description: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your tactic pool to drop up to 2 infantry from 1 of your cruisers or destroyers into 1 or more systems that do not contain another player's ships; infantry cannot be placed on planets that contain another player's ground forces.

faction_techs.name: Spec Ops II (G)
faction_techs.description: Infantry upgrade: Combat 6. When this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. On a 5+, place 1 infantry in the same system.

agents.name: Rear Admiral Tarvok
agents.description: When a fleet moves, you may allow it to move +1 space.

commanders.name: Evelyn Delouis
commanders.description: Unlock: Win a space combat. When producing units, produce 1 extra destroyer.

heroes.name: Jace X. 4th Air Division
heroes.description: Once per game: Place 1 infantry on every planet you control.

promissory.name: Military Support
promissory.description: When you recruit ground forces, gain 1 infantry on any planet you control.

flagship.name: Genesis
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5 (x2), Move 1, Capacity 12. When in combat, add 2 dice.

mech.name: Zeta Division
mech.description: Combat 6. After you win a ground combat, place 1 infantry on that planet.

starting_techs.name: Neural Motivator (G)
starting_techs.description: During the action phase, you may spend 1 command token from your tactic pool to allow 1 of your factions to use its PRODUCTION ability.

starting_techs.name: Antimass Deflectors (B)
starting_techs.description: Your ships can move through systems that contain other player's ships.

abilities.name: Ambush
abilities.description: At the start of a space combat, you may roll 1 die for each of up to 2 of your cruisers or destroyers in the system. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, produce 1 hit.

abilities.name: Pillage
abilities.description: After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, gain 1 trade good for each player that has units in systems adjacent to that system.

faction_techs.name: Salvage Operations (Y)
faction_techs.description: After you win or lose a space combat, you may place 1 cruiser in the system if you have capacity.

faction_techs.name: Mirror Computing (Y)
faction_techs.description: When you spend trade goods, you may spend 1 less trade good.

agents.name: Suffi An, Spymaster
agents.description: At the start of a combat, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +2 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during that combat.

commanders.name: Ipswitch, Loose Cannon
commanders.description: Unlock: Have 4 cruisers on the game board. During combat, apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

heroes.name: Thundra, the Coalescence
heroes.description: Once per game: For each player, destroy up to 2 of their non-fighter ships in systems that contain your ships.

promissory.name: Promise of Protection
promissory.description: At the start of your turn: Remove all of another player's command tokens from the board except those in their home system and systems that contain 1 or more of their ships.

flagship.name: Fourth Moon
flagship.description: Cost 8, Combat 5 (x2), Move 1, Capacity 3. Other players' ships in this system cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

mech.name: Starlancer
mech.description: Combat 6. At the start of ground combat, roll 1 die for each ground force on this planet; for each result of 8 or higher, 1 of your opponent's ground forces is destroyed.

starting_techs.name: Plasma Scoring (R)
starting_techs.description: When 1 or more of your units use BOMBARDMENT or SPACE CANNON, 1 of those units may roll 1 additional die.

starting_techs.name: Sarween Tools (G)
starting_techs.description: When you produce units, reduce the combined cost by 1.

planets.name: Mecatol Rex
planets.legendary_ability: At the end of the status phase, gain 1 victory point if you control Mecatol Rex.
